Operations Bulletin 
February 2011 
Joint Inspection Group 
 
JV Core Principles 
Annual Compliance Self-Audit & Refresher Training 
 
This Bulletin is to confirm that the annual Core Principle self-audit and refresher training 
process as introduced by JIG Bulletins 33 and 34 in 2010 is to continue as an annual 
process for all in-scope JV Core Principles sites. 
Core Principles documentation has been reviewed by the industry and confirmed that there 
are no changes to the legal documentation or refresher training presentations. 
Updates 
* 
A new Core Principle Question and Answer sheet has been prepared which JV 
Managers can use with staff to confirm training and retain as a training record 
(Document Ref JIG CP 1.22 v1 260111 Core Principles Q&A for JV's.doc). 
* 
The Core Principles Compliance Audit Form has been updated for improved 
functionality (please note it includes a 'Help Sheet' to assist you completing your self 
audit). (Document Ref JIG CP 1 01 v4 240111 Core Principles Compliance Audit 
Form.xls). 
* 
All JV Core Principles documents can be downloaded from the Core Principles 
Documents area of the JIG website (www.jointinspectiongroup.org). 
Actions 
1. Sites may choose when to do their self-audit during the year to suit operational

Actions 
1. Sites may choose when to do their self-audit during the year to suit operational 
demands but all sites should plan to confirm full annual compliance by 31st October 
each year unless agreed otherwise with their JV participants. 
2. Copies of completed self-audit forms should be sent to the JV Manager and each of 
the Participant JV Representatives. 
3. For JIG sites, a copy of the completed self-audit form should also be uploaded onto 
the Core Principles Audit section of the JIG website (NB. For clarity the JIG web site 
has been improved so that only the latest Core Principles Audit Form is held in the 
Core Principles Audit section of the website. Old audit forms are automatically 
archived into the Core Principles Audit Archive section of JIG website).
